## 📖 Friendship book 📖
<center>
In addition to the main gift, we would like to gift Mads a “friendship book” and we need your input for that!
</center>

<br></br>

**Deadline to fill out:** Monday, April 8th, 2024

**Steps:**

1. On the landing page, enter your name and email address (click [here](Mads_DO_NOT_OPEN.jpg) to see what the landing page looks like).
2. On the same landing page, pick the language you prefer to fill out the questionnaire.
3. Answer several questions about Mads.
4. Write a short personal message.
5. Upload a picture of yourself.
